channel.title: CVE Feed for Johnson Controls -- Metasys ADS/ADX/OAS server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Johnson Controls -- Metasys ADS/ADX/OAS server

item.title: CVE-2022-21937|2024-09-16T18:23:37.977Z -- johnson%20controls -- metasys%20ads%2Fadx%2Foas%20server
item.description: Under certain circumstances, a vulnerability in Metasys ADS/ADX/OAS 10 versions prior to 10.1.5 and Metasys ADS/ADX/OAS 11 versions prior to 11.0.2 could allow a user to inject malicious code into the web interface.

item.title: CVE-2021-36200|2024-09-16T17:07:41.371Z -- johnson%20controls -- metasys%20ads%2Fadx%2Foas%20server
item.description: Under certain circumstances an unauthenticated user could access the the web API for Metasys ADS/ADX/OAS 10 versions prior to 10.1.6 and 11 versions prior to 11.0.2 and enumerate users.

item.title: CVE-2022-21935|2024-09-16T19:57:26.166Z -- johnson%20controls -- metasys%20ads%2Fadx%2Foas%20server
item.description: A vulnerability in Metasys ADS/ADX/OAS 10 versions prior to 10.1.5 and Metasys ADS/ADX/OAS 11 versions prior to 11.0.2 allows unverified password change.

item.title: CVE-2022-21938|2024-09-16T17:19:16.453Z -- johnson%20controls -- metasys%20ads%2Fadx%2Foas%20server
item.description: Under certain circumstances, a vulnerability in Metasys ADS/ADX/OAS 10 versions prior to 10.1.5 and Metasys ADS/ADX/OAS 11 versions prior to 11.0.2 could allow a user to inject malicious code into the MUI Graphics web interface.

item.title: CVE-2022-21934|2024-09-16T18:24:30.056Z -- johnson%20controls -- metasys%20ads%2Fadx%2Foas%20server
item.description: Under certain circumstances an authenticated user could lock other users out of the system or take over their accounts in Metasys ADS/ADX/OAS server 10 versions prior to 10.1.5 and Metasys ADS/ADX/OAS server 11 versions prior to 11.0.2.
